objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#1A1A1A'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#232323'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#151515'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#101010'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#292929'/><g opacity='0.2'><path d='M0 140 L1080 140' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 280 L1080 280' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 420 L1080 420' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 560 L1080 560' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 700 L1080 700' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 840 L1080 840' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 980 L1080 980' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M140 0 L140 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M280 0 L280 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M420 0 L420 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M560 0 L560 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M700 0 L700 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M840 0 L840 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M980 0 L980 1080' stroke='#888888' stroke-width='1'/></g><circle cx='800' cy='200' r='40' fill='#3A3A3A' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='100' cy='900' r='60' fill='#3A3A3A' opacity='0.4'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 1080' stroke='#444444' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><path d='M1080 0 L0 1080' stroke='#444444' stroke-width='1' opacity='0.2'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#gradient)'/><defs><linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#333333' stop-opacity='0.1'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#000000' stop-opacity='0.3'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text:
• Japanese Quartz Movement
• Stainless Steel Construction
• Chronograph Functionality
• 3ATM Waterproof Design

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek and modern design that promotes a stylish wristwatch. It uses a dark, grid-like background (`background`) divided into subtle geometric quadrants with overlayed low-opacity lines that suggest precision and structure. Dominating the right side is a high-resolution watch product image (`product_image`) scaled for prominence and showcasing luxury. On the left side, bold header text (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) introduces the product name in large, futuristic fonts, followed by a subtitle (`subheading`) in smaller uppercase text. Below, there is a neat bullet-point product description (`description`) detailing key features. The product price (`price`) is displayed in large, bold white text, emphasizing affordability. A clear call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with accompanying `"SHOP NOW"` text (`cta_text`) offers clear user direction. The overall layout effectively balances product appeal with essential sales information.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gray: `#1A1A1A`, `#232323`, `#151515`, `#101010`, `#292929`
- Accent Gray for grid: `#888888`, `#444444`
- Primary Text: `#CCCCCC`, `#A3A3A3`, `#FFFFFF`
- Button background: `#666666`
- Highlight pseudo-glow elements: `#3A3A3A`
product_color: The product image of the black Cheetah chronograph watch showcases a sleek and modern aesthetic through its monochromatic color scheme. The overall color palette includes deep jet black (#0A0A0A), graphite gray (#2E2E2E), metallic silver (#A9A9A9), and subtle steel gradients (#5C5C5C). These shades are harmoniously blended, with a brushed metallic gradient on the dial that enhances dimensionality, while polished elements on the band and dial markers offer contrast and highlight key features. Light reflection emphasizes contours and curves, making the watch stand out. These colors convey a sense of luxury, power, and refinement—perfect for a premium advertisement banner.
